submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        dif_counts = [0] * (k + 1)
        range_counts = [0] * (k + 1)
        for i in range(n//2):
            dif = abs(nums[i] - nums[n - 1 - i])
            r = max(k - min(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]), max(nums[i], nums[n - 1 - i]))
            dif_counts[dif] += 1
            range_counts[r] += 1
        curr = n
        ans = n
        for i in range(k, -1, -1):
            curr -= range_counts[i]
            ans = min(ans, curr - dif_counts[i])
        return ans
